Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).1: Perform in solo and ensemble settings with the technical and musical skills requisite for artistic self-expression.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).2: Demonstrate a knowledge of the solo repertoire of their instrument and the interpretative skills needed to execute the range of styles in that repertoire.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).3: Read solo and ensemble literature at sight with fluency.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).4: Demonstrate an understanding of music theory, including the principles of common-practice harmony, musical form and compositional process.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).5: Demonstrate aural comprehension of common-practice music.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).6: Utilize the keyboard as a tool to support music learning.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).7: Demonstrate an understanding of the styles, genres, composers, forms and processes of the standard periods of art music in the Western European tradition.
Music (BA\/BM\/BFA).8: Demonstrate the ability to synthesize historical and style-analytical information.
